DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study demonstrate superiority CGE physical therapy protocol versus standard physical therapy protocol shoulder measure follow 1 month physical therapy : FI2S score include validated measure pain , glenohumeral joint range motion three plane , ability perform certain everyday activity strength forward elevation measure dynamometer .
DOC.brief_title: The Global Shoulder Concept ( GSC ) Method Versus Classic Physical Therapy Shoulder Tendinitis
DOC.detailed_description: Secondary objective : - To study evolution passive glenohumeral range motion - To study evolution global range passive active motion method use - To evaluate functional recovery ( DASH ) - To evaluate impact quality life ( SF36 ) - To study difference visual analog scale score pain physical therapy session - Compare two methods/groups three month .
DOC.criteria: The patient must give his/her inform sign consent The patient must insure beneficiary health insurance plan painful , chronic tendinopathy ( 3 month ) rotator cuff , confirm MRI The patient pregnant breastfeed Any emergency situation Nonmechanical tendinopathies ( metabolic , neurological , capsulitis , reflex sympathetic dystrophy ) tendon surgery ( tendon surgery acromioplasty )
